injections.injections.Injection¶

class injections.injections.Injection(location, times, magnitudes)¶

Bases: object

Class for injections at a single location

__init__(location, times, magnitudes)¶

Creates an injection object

Parameters:

  • location (int) – Location of the injection

  • times (list) – List of times for the injection

  • magnitudes (list) – List of magnitudes for the injection

Methods
